body_content.explanation: an occasion when an organization, state, etc. is established:
examples: the foundation of a new state

body_content.explanation: an organization that has been created in order to provide money for a particular group of people in need of help or for a particular type of study:
the first year of infant school, previously known as reception:
examples: Her youngest child starts (in) foundation in September.

body_content.explanation: the structures below the surface of the ground that support a building:
examples: The foundations will have to be reinforced to prevent the house from sinking further into the ground.

body_content.explanation: an idea or fact that something is based on

examples: These allegations are completely without foundation.

body_content.explanation: a type of make-up that is spread over the skin of the face, usually before other make-up is put on, giving it a better and more even colour and hiding unwanted marks
